channel.title: Help on my 317
channel.description: I can't seem to change the xp ammout give by every hit....and i also want to change the damn thing that give prayer so it can be harder for player's to level...its to easy i bury 5 and im alreay 60 pray not even challenging....i know how to code but for gotgot how to add event example {christmas events} my second time working on a 317 but i have been 2 years working on 508s.
